Room.Name: Llanandar's Tackle Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a most exquisite archery tackle and fletching shop.
Room.LongDescription: The small room is neat as a pin, and the work bench has all the tools in a neat rack nearby. There is a crossbow on the bench which looks to be completely finished. A small blue ball, shining brightly, lies beside it. The room is so tiny, and you are so big, that you have probably scared everyone into hiding.
